TopicTitle: Symmetry attached parts disappearing after changing anchored part

Articles.Content:
To replicate: Place small fuel tank. Radially attach another small fuel tank to the side of the first in 3x symmetry mode. use the "3" function to change the anchored part from the central tank to one of the radially attached tanks. Pick up the entire craft and observe that the mirrored tanks disappear. Profit. 

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
